verses.name: Joshua 24:27
verses.text: And Joshua said unto all the people, Behold, this stone shall be a witness unto us; for it hath heard all the words of the Lord which he spake unto us: it shall be therefore a witness unto you, lest ye deny your God.

verses.name: Joshua 24:28
verses.text: So Joshua let the people depart, every man unto his inheritance.

verses.name: Joshua 24:29
verses.text: And it came to pass after these things, that Joshua the son of Nun, the servant of the Lord, died, being an hundred and ten years old.
